title: Most Dangerous Book in the World: 9/11 as Mass Ritual
description: In this shocking expos√©, investigative researcher and author S. K. Bain reveals the truth behind the mass-murdering psychopaths responsible for the events of September 11, 2001, and reconstructs the occult-driven script for this Global Luciferian MegaRitual.
